name: Seashore - Pick 'em up
description:
Udin is a beach guard. He always finds other people throwing trash on the beach. So he initiatively picks up trash and throw them to trash bins. Help Udin gather and throw the trash in the trash bins.

Controls

[WASD] or [arrow keys] – move

[E] – to interact (take trash / put trash on trash bins)
